ACCEUILE.descrip: When it comes to transportation, Sheelni is your trusted partner. We understand the importance of dependable logistics solutions, which is why we prioritize efficiency, reliability, and convenience in everything we do. With cutting-edge technology and extensive experience, we offer seamless transport services you can rely on. Experience peace of mind knowing that your items are in safe hands with Sheelni.

PRESTATION-SERVICE-1.desc: Stay informed with our mobile app and website. Book your van easily with our online platform. A simple form on the website or app ensures a quick reservation process. Enjoy the convenience of booking with Sheelni and get the transportation you need, when you need it.

PRESTATION-SERVICE-3.desc: Explore the wide range of our customized moving services, carefully adjusted to meet your specific needs.

PRESTATION-SERVICE-2.desc: Experience exceptional service with Sheelni—fast deliveries, attentive support, and peace of mind.

NOTRE-COMPARE.title2: We Are a Moving Leader in UAE
NOTRE-COMPARE.desc: At Sheelni, we are a renowned transportation company based in UAE. We specialize in transporting a wide range of items, from delicate paper documents to full moving services, to specific locations in the Djerba region. Our services are tailored to meet the transport needs of both businesses and individuals, ensuring efficient and reliable deliveries. With our deep knowledge of the area, we offer customized logistics solutions to meet your specific requirements. Whether it’s a small package or a large shipment, our dedicated team is committed to delivering your items safely and on time.

DEMENAGEMENT.Paragraph: Fast secure delivery. Very good courteous
DEMENAGEMENT.Para: and polite driver satisfied I will not hesitate to use your services again.

Header.desc: Dedicated and competent professionals - Committed to providing smooth and reliable transport services.

Nos-Service.desc: Providing exceptional transportation services in UAE . Reliable and efficient logistics solutions tailored to your needs.

ABOUT-SERVICE.desc1: We are proud to present our comprehensive range of transport services, designed to meet your varied needs. Guided by our commitment to excellence, we provide reliable and efficient solutions to ensure smooth transport for your shipments.
ABOUT-SERVICE.desc2: From collection to delivery; whether you have light, heavy, or specialized parcels, our team is ready to handle everything by adopting the most appropriate logistics strategies. We carefully handle each step, offering much more than just a service.

ÉTAPES-FACILES.desc: Our approach aims to offer you a fully satisfying experience! Contact us and get a quote in a blink of an eye.

SERVICE.desc1: We strive to create an inclusive experience, where each step of our process is meticulously arranged to ensure an unparalleled level of accuracy. From collecting items to delivery, we put in place rigorous protocols to ensure seamless execution. Whether you have questions, queries, or simply need information, our contact system allows you to reach us seamlessly. Sign up, drop us a line, or just give us a call!

identity.title: 1. Company Identity
identity.description: Company Name: FORTEKMA, Legal Form: Limited Liability Company (SARL), Share Capital: 10,000 TND, Registered Office Address: YASMINE Building, Avenue de la Bourse, Berge du Lac 2, 1053, Tunisia, Phone: +216 36 848 020, Email: contact@fortekma.com, Trade Register Number: 1906853H, Tax Identification Number: 1906853H, APE Code: 74.13.

dataProcessing.title: 2. Data Processing Officer
dataProcessing.description: Name of the Officer: Alaeddine Rezgani, Email of the Officer: alaeddine.rezgani@fortekma.com.

dataPurposes.title: 3. Purposes of Data Processing
dataPurposes.description: Personal data is collected for the purposes of: Managing orders and contracts, Personalizing services and communications, Improving user experience, Sending marketing and promotional information, Conducting statistical studies.

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.description: Processing is based on: The execution of a contract (e.g., when placing an order), The user's consent for marketing communications, Compliance with legal obligations (e.g., invoicing).

rights.title: 5. Rights of Data Subjects
rights.description: In accordance with Tunisian Law No. 2004-63 on the protection of personal data, data subjects have the right to: Access their personal data, Rectify inaccurate data, Delete their data under certain circumstances, Restrict the processing of their data, Object to processing for legitimate reasons.

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention Period
dataRetention.description: Personal data is retained for the duration necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected. This period may vary depending on the purpose of the processing.

securityMeasures.title: 7. Security Measures
securityMeasures.description: FORTEKMA implements appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.

dpd.title: 8. Data Protection Officer (DPO)
dpd.mrc: For any questions regarding our legal notice, please contact us at: contact@fortekma.com.
dpd.description: FORTEKMA has appointed a Data Protection Officer (DPO). You can contact them at the following email address: alaeddine.rezgani@fortekma.com.

Maintenance.description2: For any urgent requests or assistance, please contact us via email or by phone.

Politiques.title: Privacy Policy - Users
Politiques.description: Nous nous engageons à protéger et respecter votre vie privée. Cette politique de confidentialité explique comment nous recueillons, utilisons, partageons et protégeons vos données personnelles.

personalData.title: 1. Commitment to Privacy
personalData.description: We are committed to protecting and respecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal data.

applicableLaws.title: 2. Personal Data Collected
applicableLaws.description: We process your personal data lawfully, fairly, and transparently. Only the necessary information for the purposes specified in this policy is collected.
applicableLaws.description2: The personal data we may collect includes:
applicableLaws.description3: By using our site, you consent to the automatic collection of certain data. You have the right to withdraw this consent at any time.

lawfulBasis.title: 3. Legal Basis for Processing
lawfulBasis.description: The processing of your data is lawful when based on one of the following legal grounds:

dataUse.title: 4. Use of Personal Data
dataUse.description: Your data will only be used for the purposes specified in this policy, without unauthorized use or disclosure.

dataSharing.title: 5. Sharing of Personal Data
dataSharing.description: We may share your data with third parties only when necessary to achieve the objectives outlined in this policy. We ensure that these third parties respect the confidentiality of your data.

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention Period
dataRetention.description: We retain your data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected and in compliance with applicable laws.

minors.title: 7. Protection of Minors
minors.description: Users under 15 years old must obtain consent from a legal representative before using our site.

userRights.title: 8. Users' Rights
userRights.description: In accordance with the GDPR, you have the right to:
userRights.desc: To exercise these rights, please contact us at:

cookiePolicy.title: 9. Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.description: We use analytical cookies to enhance the site's design and functionality. Please refer to our cookie policy for more details.

modifications.title: 10. Policy Updates
modifications.description: This policy may be updated to remain compliant with legal requirements. We encourage you to review it regularly.

contact.title: 11. Contact
contact.description: For any questions regarding this privacy policy, please contact us at:
contact.mrc: Thank you for trusting Sheelni with the protection of your personal data.

COOKIES.title: Cookie Policy of Sheelni Technologie
COOKIES.description: At <Bold>Sheelni Technologie</Bold>, we take your privacy seriously and are transparent about our use of technologies such as cookies on our websites and applications. This cookie policy explains how we use these technologies and the options available to you to control them.

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What are cookies and similar technologies
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies and similar technologies are small data files stored on your device when you visit our website or use our applications. They help us ensure the proper functioning, analysis, and improvement of our services while personalizing your experience. These technologies also include web beacons, pixels, tags, and SDKs in our mobile applications.

howDoTheyWork.title: 2. How do they work?
howDoTheyWork.description: Cookies are small files with a unique identifier that store data when you visit our site. They can be temporary (session cookies) or permanent. Web beacons, pixels, and SDKs work similarly by collecting information about your site usage.

whatInformationDoWeCollect.title: 3. What information do we collect?
whatInformationDoWeCollect.description: Cookies collect information such as your language preferences, login identifiers, device type, browser used, date and time of your visits, and the pages you view.

cookieTypes.title: 4. Types of cookies we use:
cookieTypes.necessaryCookies: Necessary cookies: Essential for the operation of the site, they cannot be disabled. They are activated in response to your actions, such as setting your preferences.
list: Functionality cookies: Enhance the functionality and personalization of your use of our services.
Performance cookies: Allow us to measure and improve the performance of our site by counting visits and analyzing traffic.
Advertising cookies: Used to understand your interests and serve you relevant advertisements on other sites.

cookieRetention.title: 5. Duration of cookie retention:
cookieRetention.description:
Session cookies: Expire automatically when the browser is closed.
Permanent cookies: Retained for a defined period or until manually deleted.

howToDisableCookies.title: 6. How to disable cookies:
howToDisableCookies.description: You can change your cookie preferences at any time in the "Customize my choices" section. However, please note that this may affect the proper functioning of our sites and applications.

emailAnalysis.title: 8. Email analysis:
emailAnalysis.description: The emails we send contain performance cookies to measure the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns.

consent.title: 9. Consent:
consent.description: In most cases, we ask for your consent for the use of cookies. Necessary cookies do not require consent, but you can block or delete them.

moreInfo.title: 10. Need more information?
moreInfo.description: Please review our privacy policies for more information on how we handle your data. For any questions about cookies, contact our team at: <Bold>contact@sheelni.com</Bold>

Survey.title: How did you hear about us?
